short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Docs compatible extension that uses information provided by the sighted collaborators in a mixed-ability group.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Docs compatible extension that uses information provided by the sighted collaborators in a mixed-ability group to better represent collaborative awareness information when writing collaboratively. To use, you have to have the corresponding Google Docs Add-on installed.
